supplier_of: rice | cereals and grains | spanish rice and paella
information: Spanish rice producer since 1927. Protected denomination of origen rice from Delta del Ebro. Spanish rice types such as bomba rice, paella rice, medium grain, long grain, parboiled and brown rice under Montsià brand. Our new product launched is the Montsià Paella kit, which contains all ingredients you need to cook a paella in 15 min. Easy to prepare and with no artificial colorants or conservants. We also sell in bulk and in big bags to industries.
